title: CockTales Ep. 302 "I'M ABOUT TO SEE A MAN ABOUT A HORSE" ft. Sade of Black Girls Texting
description:
This week Sade of Black Girls Texting joins us for a little girl talk, what really happens in the group chat, friend fallouts and great sex!
